Preparing the Sustainable Tourism Development Project (Phase 2)                                                                                                           
(TRTA MON 51422–001) 
 
PROCUREMENT PLAN 
 
Project Information 
Country  Mongolia 
Name of Executing Agency  Ministry of Environment and Tourism 
Project Name  Sustainable Tourism Development Project (Phase 2) 
Date of Effectiveness  To be determined 
TA Amount ($)  $800,000 (TASF-6) 
Period Covered by this Plan  August 2020–April 2021 
 
 
Procurement Threshold and Goods 
Procurement Methods  To be used above/below ($) 
Shopping goods  </= $20,000 
 
 
List of Contract Packages for Goods

Costs ($)  Methods  Review
